snippet: E-book readers are great for reading books, but they can't be used get directions or watch videos of people dumping ice over their heads....

headline.print_headline: A Closer Look: Reading Tablets Decent, but Needed?
headline.main: A Closer Look: Reading Tablets Decent, but Needed?

lead_paragraph: E-book readers are great for reading books, but they can't be used get directions or watch videos of people dumping ice over their heads.
